title: The Grand Duke
tags: how to unlock the grand duke
content:
was true to her word: she helped us lead Grand Duke Ravengard to safety. We should return to the submersible and speak with him.

Talk to Ravengard.

We rescued Grand Duke Ravengard from the Iron Throne. We should speak with him in our camp; for now, The Emperor seems to be shielding him from the Absolute's voice. In exchange for an eternal pact with Wyll, Mizora resurrected Grand Duke Ravengard. We should speak with him.

The Grand Duke Walkthrough

This quest begins as part of the Wyll's ques
